title: Find a training course to become a dangerous goods (ADR) driver
overview: Find training courses to help you become a qualified dangerous goods (ADR) vehicle driver.
introduction:
Youâ€™ll need to take a training course and pass an exam to [become a qualified dangerous goods driver](/become-dangerous-goods-driver). 

The training course you take depends on the type of dangerous goods you want to transport.

If you want to do your training online, contact your nearest provider to see if they offer this option.
more_information:
All training courses include:

- Class 2: gases
- Class 3: flammable liquids
- Class 4: flammable solids
- Class 5: oxidising substances
- Class 6: toxic substances
- Class 8: corrosive substances
- Class 9: miscellaneous substances

Some training courses also include:

- Class 1: explosives
- Class 7: radioactive materials
